text:
[Verse]
Sunshine on my face
Feeling so alive
No worries no race
Just happy to survive

[Verse 2]
Waves crashing on by
Sand beneath our feet
Underneath the sky
Where hearts and summers meet

[Chorus]
Summer daydreams
Feeling so free
Under the blue
Just you and me

[Verse 3]
Laughter in the air
Music in our hearts
Without any care
Where magic always starts

[Chorus]
Summer daydreams
Feeling so free
Under the blue
Just you and me

[Bridge]
Every moment spins
Around and round we go
Life begins again
In this endless glow
title: Summer Daydreams
